constituent: read, say, words, keitai, mouth, sell, sale, samurai, paper punch, Miss World, crown, human legs
heisigStory: In the age of advertising, most words we read are out to sell some product or point of view.
hint: đọc. là lời nói được đem bán.
koohiiStory1: Read the WORDS used to SELL things.
koohiiStory2: People will say (言) almost anything to make a sale (売); don´t believe everything you read (読).
myStory: đọc. là lời nói được đem bán.
readingExamples: 読書 (どくしょ), 音読 (おんどく), 購読 (こうどく), 読本 (どくほん), 読む (よ.む)
words:
購読(こうどく): subscription (e.g. magazine)
講読(こうどく): reading, translation
読者(どくしゃ): reader
読み上げる(よみあげる): to read out loud (and clearly), to call a roll
朗読(ろうどく): reading aloud, recitation
句読点(くとうてん): punctuation marks
読書(どくしょ): reading
読み(よみ): reading
読む(よむ): read
